summary: Hey guys, It took me absolutely ages to get the quality sexy enough! The Resolution to play with is very hard with the Arrow meshes.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE:

*** Added the Ceremonial Version of the arrows. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey guys,

You can find the Bronze Arrows in the Steel Smithing Category.

LEVEL LISTED?: Yes it is, but it\'s not common like Steel / Iron.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

REQUIREMENTS:
* Steel Smithing /
* Steel Arrows /
* Corundum Ingot /
* Ale (Cos everyone needs a drink after a hard day\'s blacksmithing + It\'s part of the Bronze Set)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURES: (Comparison: Vanilla Steel Arrows Stats)

----
* Weight: 0lb more
----
* Attack: 20% stronger
----
* Force Impact: 20% better 
----     
* Speed: 4% faster
----
* Range: 3.3% Further
----
* COST: 2.5x more (2 > 5g)


Ignore my Damage stats. That\'s due to Requiem. Your Bronze Arrows will be \'12Dam\' Native. 


Hope you like it guys. I know a few liked by Black Iron Ore Arrows so this is like a little thank you.
author: Elgar2389
